title: Shower

verbs: Scatter in a mass or jet of droplets
To scatter in a mass or jet of droplets.
nouns: A plumbing fixture that sprays water over you
An area in which one bathes underneath a spray of water.
Place in which a person bathes under a spray of water
The part of a shower where the water comes out.
A device for bathing by which water is made to fall on the body from a height, either from a tank or by the action of a pump.
A bathroom (or area within a bathroom) in which a shower is not surrounded by any barrier
A shower is a place in which a person bathes under a spray of, typically warm or hot, water.
Instance of using of this device.
Perforated nozzle that showers water on a bather.
A perforated nozzle that showers water on a bather
A perforated nozzle that showers water on a bather. Some can spray different patterns of water.
Room for personal hygiene
A room containing a bath where one can bathe.
A room containing a bath or shower and usually a washbasin and toilet
A room with a toilet, but no shower or bathtub, and typically no sink; a water closet.
Room with a toilet (the device) and, typically, a sink, but no shower or bathtub.
A bathroom or lavatory in a home containing a sink and a toilet, but no bathtub or shower.
A room with a toilet (the device), sink, and bathtub.
A bathroom is a room for personal hygiene, generally containing a bathtub or a shower, and possibly also a bidet.
A room (as in a residence) containing a bathtub or shower and usually a washbasin and toilet
Chemical compound formed of molecules composed of two atoms of hydrogen and one of oxygen

Binary compound that occurs at room temperature as a clear colorless odorless tasteless liquid; freezes into ice below 0 degrees centigrade and boils above 100 degrees centigrade; widely used as a solvent
The liquid form of this chemical; liquid H?O.
Common liquid (H?O) which forms rain, rivers, the sea, etc., and which makes up a large part of the bodies of organisms.
Water is a common chemical substance, that is essential to all known forms of life.
Water is a transparent fluid which forms the world's streams, lakes, oceans and rain, and is the major constituent of the fluids of living things.
Clear liquid H?O.

description:
A silver shower head, streaming water to the left. Pressure level varies across platforms. üßº Soap not provided.

Commonly used for various content concerning bathing, washing, cleaning, and water. Shower heads are also featured in üõÅ Bathtub and üõÄ Person Taking a Bath.
apple_vendor_description: The shower emoji on Apple devices features a sleek, modern showerhead with a bright, polished chrome finish, reflecting subtle highlights from realistic lighting. Water droplets are depicted with a clear, translucent quality, cascading downwards with a sense of refreshing fluidity, a hallmark of Apple's detailed design. This emoji is commonly used to represent cleanliness, rejuvenation, or the act of taking a shower.
